::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Liono, a half sneer on his face. He serioustly didn't like 
being talked to this way, especially not by a maximal.

Zardus shruggs. "Very well," he says and sets off after Hell Beast and 
Megatron, raising his comm-link to his mouth.

"Nemesis, please acompany me to the meeting," he says into it, "Hiss, 
Breakdown, stay here to make sure the maximals don't try anything. Blue 
Reeker, return to base."
